# BudgetBee

> BudgetBee is a comprehensive financial information and recommendation platform designed to help users make informed financial decisions. Built with Astro, it provides unbiased financial guidance, budgeting tips, and personalized product recommendations tailored to user needs through interactive tools and expert content.

BudgetBee specializes in personal finance education and financial product recommendations for the US market. The platform features:

- Interactive credit card recommendation quizzes with personalized results
- Comprehensive financial guides covering budgeting, investing, and debt management
- Unbiased financial product comparisons and recommendations
- Mobile-optimized responsive design with enhanced blog reading experience
- SEO-optimized content structure following TOFU/MOFU marketing funnel strategies

The platform is built using modern web technologies including Astro, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, ensuring fast loading times and excellent user experience.
